data.title: Bruce Willis' wife and ex Demi Moore lead tributes to actor on Father's Day
data.meta_description: Bruce Willis was showered in love on Father's Day as both his wife Emma Heming Willis and ex-wife Demi Moore shared heartwarming tributes to the Die Hard star.
data.text:
Demi Moore dances with Bruce Willis in sweet Instagram video

Bruce Willis was inundated with love on Father's Day, receiving touching tributes from his wife Emma Heming Willis, ex-wife Demi Moore, and all of his daughters.

The family flocked to Instagram to honour the beloved Die Hard icon, posting a collection of nostalgic photographs that captured Bruce's journey as a doting dad to his five girls.

Bruce shares three daughters with Demi: 35-year-old Rumer, 32-year-old Scout, and 30-year-old Tallulah.

His marriage to Emma blessed him with two more daughters, 12-year-old Mabel Ray and 10-year-old Evelyn Penn.

A heartwarming post shared by Emma, Demi, and daughters Tallulah, Rumer, and Scout featured a montage of Bruce's fatherhood moments, including an endearing recent photo of Scout tenderly stroking the face of the 69-year-old retired Hollywood star.

The caption for the collage of cherished memories read: "Happy Father's Day to our favorite girl dad. We love you, BW!"

Devotees of Bruce expressed their admiration in the comments section, praising the heartfelt gesture and extending their own affection for the esteemed actor.

One admirer penned: "Honestly.... The best... you girls are Blessed indeed as he is to have you."

Another added their sentiment: "So time flies, we will remember him from the movie The 5th Element. Happy Father's Day."

A third chimed in with high praise: "Such a gorgeous man! Talented actor! Total package."

Meanwhile, another fan touched on Bruce's fight with frontotemporal dementia, sharing their personal connection: "This is beautiful.

"I understand I'm a daughter who had to go through the same thing and watching a very strong man strong-minded man turn into a different man sometimes it's hard to explain but I understand. Happy Father's Day to Papa." (sic)

In related news, Rumer, Bruce's daughter, has recently opened up about her father's exceptional role as a dad and now, as an adoring grandfather.

Despite facing health challenges, Bruce has developed a profound connection with Rumer's little girl.

Reflecting on this during her visit to the Today show, Rumer discussed how her father interacts with his 13-month-old granddaughter Louetta.

"It's so nice because I feel like my dad is just like - he's a girl dad through and through," she shared.

"It almost unlocks that kind of little-kid, girl-dad thing. He's so sweet with her."
